attributes.action: “Chagos Islanders should be allowed to return to their homeland without let or hindrance.”
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each successive government inherits the guilt of the governments past. The need to repatriate these people represents the most fundamental part of our democracy. Ignoring it simply demonstrates the facade that modern politics has become in ignoring those without a voice. The failure of the government’s appeal (23.05.07) rules their acts are unlawful. This should be rectified.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
